nl.nikhef.jgridstart.gui.util
Class ErrorMessage

java.lang.Object
  nl.nikhef.jgridstart.gui.util.ErrorMessage

public class ErrorMessage
extends Object

Uniform way to handle error messages.

This shows an error dialog to the user, and logs the exception, if any.

Method Detail

error

public static void error(Component parent,
                         String title,
                         Throwable e,
                         String extramsg)
show an error to the user. This method is for errors that are meaningful to the user, such as an IOException.

Parameters:
parent - Parent window
title - Title of the dialog
e - Exception to get information from
extramsg - Additional error message details to display

internal

public static void internal(Component parent,
                            Throwable e)
show an error to the user. This method is for errors that should not occur; the dialog indicates that the user can contact the developers.

Parameters:
parent - Parent window
e - Exception to get information from

                            Exception e)
See Also:

internal

public static void internal(Component parent,
                            String msg)
show an error to the user. This method is for errors that should not occur; the dialog indicates that the user can contact the developers.

Parameters:
parent - Parent window
msg - Message to describe to error

logException

public static void logException(Throwable e)
logs an exception

createJDialog

protected static JDialog createJDialog(Component parent)
Create new JDialog with a parent Component.

If the component is no Frame or JDialog, a new unparented dialog is returned.

JDialog has no constructor with Window on Java5 and below, so that is not used.
